rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Caractéristique fabriquée
Human-Made Feature
Искусственный Признак
Ανθρωπογενές Μόρφωμα
Hergestelltes Merkmal
Característica Fabricada
人造外貌表征
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises physical features that are purposely created by human activity, such as scratches, artificial caves, artificial water channels, etc. No assumptions are made as to the extent of modification required to justify regarding a feature as man-made. For example, rock art or even “cup and ring” carvings on bedrock a regarded as types of E25 Human-Made Feature.
